name: PostgreSQL
short_description: Powerful open-source relational database with advanced features.
description: Powerful open-source relational database with advanced features. PostgreSQL is a self-hosted application focused on database, storage, utility, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host PostgreSQL on your home server to powerful open-source relational database with advanced features without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use PostgreSQL to manage your database workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
